price: 18. Het volk van ‘Ad verloochende, hoe vreselijk waren dan Mijn bestraffing en Mijn waarschuwingen?
arabic: كَذَّبَتۡ عَادٞ فَكَيۡفَ كَانَ عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: kadhabat ʿādun fakayfa kāna ʿadhābī wanudhuri
